name: ACCUM_INSTANCES
description: This table contains general information about accumulation instances.

columns.name: ACCUMULATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the accumulation record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACCUM_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The accumulation group associated with the accumulation instance.

columns.name: ACCUM_PREV_ACC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the previous accumulation applied to the associated accumulation group.

columns.name: ACCUM_PREV_ACC_LN
columns.description: The line in related group 90 from the accumulation corresponding to the previous accumulation instance.

columns.name: ACCUM_APPLIED_AMT
columns.description: The amount applied to the associated accumulation group.

columns.name: ACCUM_RUNNING_TOTAL
columns.description: The running total for the associated ACG after this accumulation instance was added.

columns.name: TARGET_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount that we attempt to accumulate towards the associated accumulation group (ACG).

columns.name: REVERSED_LINE
columns.description: The line in this ACC's related group 90 which is reversed by this line.

columns.name: SEQUENCE_NUMBER
columns.description: The position in the sequence of accumulation instances this line represents for the associated accumulation group.
